message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but that price is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $85?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $85. I can do a bit better than that. How about $110?
I understand, Alice. I'm trying to keep my spending under control.  Could you do $95? That would work for me.
I'm getting closer, Bob! I can see we're making progress. I can meet you halfway between $95 and $110, so how about $102.50?
